about_the_game:
With graphics harking back to the beautiful Japanese PC-98 pixelized novels and atmosphere that's a love letter to the PSP/NDS mystery games
Occult Rewrite is an erotic horror game that mixes the character-focused plot of a visual novel along with the investigation and puzzle solving elements of an adventure game.



When you and your classmates find yourselves lost in a mist shrouded island, you soon fall victim to a sinister malediction. "Those who bear it will die at the strike of midnight", so says the Withering Curse.
As friends turn to enemies and clothes turn to underwear, you'll face all kinds of myths, legends and occult forces in your efforts to turn back the clock to solve the island's mystery.



In Occult Rewrite, you can't expect to enter-key your way to victory.
For gameplay we have several different mechanics such as
- Alternate Routes                             - Puzzles
- Dialogue Choices                            - Investigations
- Multiple Endings                             - Logic Sections

And more!

Acessibility!


We also have a SFW/NSFW toggle in the options for streaming guideline compliance so you don't have to worry about strikes and/or people walking in on you!
(It's still not recommended to play Occult Rewrite in front of your parents)



It's not "Erotic Horror" without the Fanservice!

Occult Rewrite has over 70 unique CGs and 30 different scenes for every kind of taste. From a wholesome passionate kiss to a depraved [REDACTED] we've got it!


It's not "Erotic Horror" without the Horror either!

Tactical Pants-shitting action! (Also, no jump scares, we know sudden hand movements can be dangerous when handling delicate parts.) Reaching your good ending won't be that easy, as the island is home to all kinds of folkloric creatures from all over the world.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains crass humour, fantasy violence, partial nudity, mentions of alcohol consumption, sexual themes and dialogue. It also contains horror elements some people may find scary or disturbing.
